name: Nature’s Recipe Grain-Free Chicken, Sweet Potato & Pumpkin
description: High-quality grain-free dry formula featuring real chicken as the first ingredient, balanced with fiber-rich sweet potato and pumpkin for easy digestion. Supports healthy skin, coat, and sustained energy for adult dogs.

name: Pure Balance Chicken & Pea Grain-Free Dry Food
description: Grain-free balanced kibble crafted with real chicken and pea protein to deliver lean muscle support and sustained energy. Formulated without corn, wheat, or soy to suit dogs with common grain sensitivities.

name: Merrick Backcountry Raw-Infused Great Plains Red
description: Protein-rich, grain-free dry recipe combining kibble with raw-infused freeze‑dried pieces for enhanced aroma and taste. Features red meat sources to support strong muscles and omega fatty acids for skin and coat health.

name: Purina One True Instinct Grain-Free Beef & Sweet Potato
description: Grain-free formula featuring real beef for highly digestible protein and sweet potatoes for complex carbohydrates. Provides antioxidants, vitamins, and omega fatty acids to promote immune function and shiny coat.

name: Purina Pro Plan Complete Essentials Grilled Seafood Entrée
description: Tender grilled seafood entrée in savory gravy formulated to support lean muscle maintenance and hydration. Enriched with essential taurine, antioxidants, and balanced minerals for overall feline vitality.

name: Fancy Feast Classic Turkey & Giblets Feast
description: Classic smooth paté featuring turkey and nutrient-dense giblets for palatability and amino acid support. Provides a 100% complete and balanced diet with moisture to aid urinary tract health.

name: Tiki Cat After Dark Chicken & Duck Stew
description: High-protein, biologically appropriate stew blending shredded chicken and nutrient-rich duck in a broth that supports hydration. Grain free and crafted with real organ meats for natural taurine and micronutrients.

name: Wellness Stew Salmon & Duck
description: Moisture-rich gourmet stew featuring flaky salmon and succulent duck to deliver diversified animal proteins. Helps support joint, skin, and immune health with balanced vitamins, taurine, and omega fatty acids.

name: Blue Buffalo Dental Chews
description: Natural grain-free dental chews shaped and textured to help scrape away plaque and tartar while freshening breath. Fortified with added minerals and designed to be easily digestible for daily oral care.

name: Merrick Power Bites Real Chicken Treats
description: Soft and chewy high-value training treats made with real deboned chicken as the first ingredient. Rich aroma encourages focus while added omega fatty acids and glucosamine support skin, coat, and joint wellness.

name: Wellness Soft Puppy Bites
description: Tender bite-sized puppy rewards crafted with real duck and salmon to provide DHA for cognitive development. Grain-free recipe supports early training with a texture gentle on developing teeth.

name: Redbarn Grain-Free Beef & Berry Treat Jerky
description: Air-dried jerky style treats combining real beef muscle meat with antioxidant-rich blueberries and cranberries. Grain and gluten free, providing a chewy texture ideal for moderate reward-based training.

name: Merrick Grain-Free Real Duck & Sweet Potato Puppy
description: Grain-free developmental formula featuring novel duck protein and digestible sweet potatoes to fuel growth. Enriched with DHA, chondroitin, and antioxidants to support brain, joint, and immune system maturation.

name: Hill’s Science Diet Sensitive Stomach & Skin Adult
description: Veterinarian-recommended nutrition formulated with prebiotic fiber and highly digestible ingredients to soothe sensitive stomachs. Added vitamin E and omega-6 fatty acids nourish skin and promote a glossy coat.

name: Royal Canin Small Breed Adult Sensitive Digestion
description: Precision nutrition tailored for small breed adults needing digestive support. Features highly digestible proteins, balanced prebiotics, and an exclusive kibble size to promote chewing and healthy microbiota.

name: Purina ONE Healthy Senior Dry Dog Food
description: Nutrient-dense senior formula with enhanced botanical oils, high-quality protein for lean muscle preservation, and natural sources of glucosamine to support joint health. Fortified with vitamins A & E for immune resilience.

name: Ruffwear Front Range Harness
description: Everyday adventure harness featuring foam-padded chest and belly panels for comfort, dual leash attachment points (aluminum V-ring & reinforced webbing), and four points of adjustment for a secure ergonomic fit.

name: Blueberry Pet Classic Collar
description: Durable yet soft nylon collar with high-density webbing, eco-friendly plastic buckle, and nickel-coated D-ring. Fully adjustable design suited for cats or toy dog breeds seeking everyday style and comfort.

name: Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Harness
description: Crash-tested travel harness engineered with all-steel nesting buckles and broad padded chest plate to distribute force. Functions as both walking and automotive restraint harness with seatbelt tether compatibility.

name: Rabbitgoo No-Pull Harness & Leash Set
description: Anti-pull harness leveraging dual metal leash attachment points including a front chest ring to reduce pulling and improve steering. Breathable mesh padding and reflective trims enhance comfort and visibility.

name: Big Barker Orthopedic Dog Bed (Medium)
description: Premium orthopedic foam mattress calibrated to support joint alignment and relieve pressure points for medium and large dogs. Removable micro-suede cover is machine washable and designed to retain loft over time.

name: K&H Self-Warming Pet Pad
description: Thermal self-warming pad lined with layer that reflects pets' body heat without electricity. Non-slip bottom and plush faux lambskin surface provide year‑round cozy resting comfort for cats and small dogs.

name: Best Friends by Sheri Donut Cuddler
description: Ultra-soft shag faux fur donut cuddler bed offering head and neck support with a raised rim and deep crevice center that encourages burrowing. Helps promote better sleep and warmth for anxious pets.

name: Petfusion Ultimate Bolster Bed
description: Supportive solid memory foam base paired with recycled poly-fill bolsters to cradle joints and spine. Water-resistant removable cover plus non-skid bottom makes it ideal for older or orthopedic-needs dogs.

name: Stainless Steel Slow Feeder Bowl
description: Innovative slow-feeder design featuring ridged interior patterns that naturally pace eating, helping reduce gulping, bloat risk, and indigestion in fast‑eating dogs. Heavy-duty, food‑safe materials are easy to clean and encourage mindful mealtime engagement.

name: Petmate Replendish Automatic Waterer
description: Gravity-driven reservoir system that continuously dispenses fresh water into a spill‑resistant basin, extending time between refills. Built‑in microban style surfaces (bottle dependent) help discourage bacterial growth and support consistent daily hydration for multi‑pet homes.

name: Yeti Boomer Dog Bowl
description: Double‑wall, kitchen‑grade stainless steel bowl engineered for extreme durability, rust resistance, and reduced temperature transfer. Non‑slip ring helps keep meals in place while rounded interior edges simplify thorough cleaning after raw or wet food.

name: Catit Flower Fountain
description: Triple‑flow adjustable pet fountain with recirculating filtration that oxygenates and cools water to entice picky cats to drink more. Multi‑layer filter helps reduce hair, debris, and mineral impurities supporting urinary tract wellness.

name: Frisco Halloween Pumpkin Pet Costume
description: Festive plush pumpkin costume crafted with lightweight, breathable fabric panels and adjustable hook‑and‑loop straps for secure, comfy seasonal wear on small dogs or cats. Adds photo‑ready charm without restricting natural movement.

name: Ruffwear Polartec Jacket
description: Technical Polartec fleece layer delivering breathable warmth, quick‑dry performance, and low bulk insulation for cold‑weather trail or urban walks. Athletic tailoring and stretch panels promote full range of motion during active play.

name: RC Pets Snuggle Fleece Hoodie
description: Cozy pullover fleece hoodie tailored for toy and small breeds, featuring a softly brushed interior for thermal retention, integrated leash portal, and ribbed cuffs that help trap warmth while maintaining a relaxed casual fit.

name: Gooby Rain Buddy Raincoat
description: Lightweight waterproof (PU‑coated) shell with adjustable belly closure and ergonomic hood that shields neck and shoulders from rain. High‑visibility accents and harness‑friendly opening support safe, dry walks in wet conditions.

name: Kong Classic Dog Toy
description: Iconic natural rubber enrichment toy engineered for unpredictable bounce and long‑lasting chew satisfaction. Hollow core can be packed with kibble, pastes, or frozen treats to stimulate mental engagement and reduce boredom.

name: Nylabone Dura Chew
description: Veterinarian‑recommended nylon chew engineered with textured surfaces and flavor infusion to satisfy instinctive chewing while discouraging destructive behaviors. Designed for powerful chewers seeking sustained engagement.

name: JW Pet Mega Ball
description: Resilient, high‑bounce squeaker ball constructed from thick rubber walls for extended fetch sessions. Textured exterior improves grip, while embedded squeak element sparks interactive drive and mental stimulation.

name: Benebone Wishbone Chew Toy
description: Ergonomic wishbone shape offers multiple prying grip angles, promoting front‑paw engagement and targeted chewing. Crafted from robust nylon infused with natural bacon flavor to sustain interest without messy residue.

name: SmartyKat Skitter Critters
description: Lightweight plush mice infused with premium catnip to trigger stalking, batting, and pounce behaviors that satisfy predatory play cycles. Soft exterior and balanced size encourage solo or multi‑cat interactive engagement.

name: PetSafe Busy Buddy Tug-A-Jugs
description: Multifunctional puzzle toy combining tug, shake, and treat‑dispensing mechanics to prolong engagement and slow treat consumption. Durable bottle chamber releases kibble intermittently, reinforcing problem‑solving behaviors.

name: Cat Dancer Rainbow Wand
description: Colorful ribbon wand teaser designed to simulate erratic prey movement, promoting aerobic exercise, coordination, and bonding through interactive play. Lightweight, flexible filament encourages extended chase sequences.

name: Outward Hound Hide-A-Squirrel
description: Interactive plush puzzle set featuring a soft tree trunk and multiple squeaky squirrels that encourage natural hunting instincts. Promotes problem solving, reduces boredom, and offers gentle indoor play for moderate chewers.

name: KONG Cozie Marvin Moose
description: Cuddly plush moose constructed with an extra layer of fabric for improved durability and a single internal squeaker to spark engagement. Ideal for light to moderate chewers seeking comfort and gentle play.

name: ZippyPaws Skinny Peltz No Stuffing Plush
description: Ultra-slim, stuffing‑free plush critter boasting multiple embedded squeakers that maintain auditory interest without interior filling mess. Perfect for shake, toss, and supervised squeak sessions.

name: Petlou Snuggles Hedgehog Plush
description: Textured plush hedgehog featuring a mix of faux fur and knit fabrics to engage tactile curiosity while remaining soft enough for snuggling. Contains a mild squeaker to encourage light interactive play.

name: Frisco Plush Fish Cat Toy
description: Soft, lightweight fish‑shaped plush sized for feline batting, wrestling, and carry play. Contains a crinkle core and light catnip infusion to stimulate predatory sequence behaviors without overwhelming sensitive cats.

name: ChuckIt! Ultra Ball
description: Ultra‑high bounce, durable rubber fetch ball engineered for superior visibility and extended outdoor training sessions. Textured surface enhances grip for wet retrieval while resisting cracking and puncture from vigorous play.

name: ZippyPaws IQ Treat Ball
description: Adjustable difficulty treat‑dispensing sphere encouraging slower eating and mental stimulation for food‑motivated cats. Internal labyrinth releases kibble intermittently, promoting problem‑solving and active paw manipulation.

name: Trixie Flip Board
description: Multi-compartment strategy board combining sliders, flaps, and lift‑out covers to challenge canine focus and scent tracking. Encourages cognitive development and reduces boredom through reward‑based exploration.

name: Nina Ottosson by Outward Hound Interactive Puzzle
description: Intermediate (Level 2) composite puzzle featuring rotating discs and sliding covers that conceal treat wells. Designed to elevate problem‑solving difficulty while maintaining safe, frustration‑mitigated engagement for motivated dogs.

name: FURminator deShedding Tool
description: Professional‑grade stainless steel edge reaches through topcoat to gently remove loose undercoat hair, helping reduce seasonal shedding up to 90% when used regularly. Ergonomic handle and eject button streamline grooming sessions.

name: Burt’s Bees for Pets Oatmeal Shampoo
description: Mild pH‑balanced shampoo blending colloidal oatmeal, honey, and beeswax derivatives to cleanse while soothing dry, itchy skin. Free from sulfates and artificial fragrances to minimize irritation in sensitive coats.

name: Safari Professional Nail Trimmer
description: Precision hardened steel nail trimmer with safety stop bar and non‑slip rubberized grips to reduce over‑cutting risk. Spring‑loaded mechanism delivers smooth controlled cuts for at‑home grooming confidence.

name: Petkin 4-Pack Slicker Brushes
description: Set of ergonomic slicker brushes featuring fine angled pins that gently detangle knots, lift loose hair, and distribute natural oils across coat. Reduces mat formation when incorporated into routine grooming.

name: Frontline Plus for Dogs (Medium-Large)
description: Veterinary‑trusted monthly topical solution providing waterproof protection against fleas, ticks, and chewing lice. Disrupts life cycle stages to curb reinfestation and support year‑round parasite management.

name: Advantage II for Cats
description: Fast‑acting topical flea treatment targeting adult fleas, larvae, and eggs on cats. Continues working for a full month to break reproductive cycles and reduce home environmental contamination.

name: Seresto Flea & Tick Collar
description: Long‑duration odorless pest control collar releasing low‑dose active ingredients to repel and kill fleas and ticks for up to 8 months. Water‑resistant design maintains efficacy after bathing or rain exposure.

name: Revolution Plus for Cats
description: Broad‑spectrum monthly spot‑on combining parasiticides to prevent heartworm disease and eliminate fleas, ticks, ear mites, and certain intestinal parasites—supporting comprehensive feline parasite control.

name: Nutri-Vet Multivitamin Chewables
description: Palatable liver‑flavored chewable supplying essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that help fill nutritional gaps in standard adult canine diets. Supports immune health, metabolism, and overall vitality.

name: VetriScience C.E.T. Enzymatic Oral Hygiene Tablets
description: Enzymatic oral hygiene tablets formulated to help reduce plaque biofilm accumulation, support gum health, and freshen breath when used alongside regular brushing or dental chews.

name: Tomlyn L-Lysine for Cats
description: L‑Lysine supplement powder designed to support immune modulation and respiratory tract wellness in cats, especially those prone to herpesvirus flare‑ups. Chicken flavor encourages voluntary intake.

name: Welactin Fish Oil Capsules (Omega-3) for Dogs & Cats
description: Pharmaceutical‑grade marine omega‑3 (EPA & DHA) softgels promoting healthy skin barrier, glossy coat, cognitive function, and joint comfort in dogs and cats. Supports systemic inflammatory balance with routine use.

name: Pet-Tabs Pet Supplement for Dogs & Cats (Multi)
description: Balanced daily multivitamin supplying essential water‑ and fat‑soluble vitamins plus trace minerals to complement standard canine and feline diets. Helps maintain metabolic efficiency and immune resilience.

name: Cornell Dental Rinse
description: Alcohol-free antibacterial oral rinse formulated to reduce plaque biofilm, freshen breath, and support healthy gums when used between brushings. Easy squeeze applicator allows targeted application along the gumline.

name: Zymox Otic Enzymatic Ear Treatment
description: Advanced enzymatic otic solution containing a patented LP3 enzyme system plus low-dose hydrocortisone to soothe itching, break down microbial colonies, and assist in managing mild fungal or bacterial ear irritations.

name: Nutri-Cal High Calorie Gel for Dogs & Cats
description: Highly palatable calorie-dense gel supplement providing concentrated energy, vitamins, and omega fatty acids—ideal for underweight, recovering, or finicky pets requiring nutritional reinforcement.

name: MidWest LifeStages Single Door Crate
description: Fold-flat heavy-gauge wire crate with removable composite pan, double slide-bolt latches, and adjustable puppy divider panel to adapt space as your dog grows. Provides secure containment and ventilation.

name: Ferplast Rabbit Residence Cage
description: Spacious multi-level rabbit habitat featuring deep litter base, elevated resting platform, secure wire upper frame, and front access doors for simplified cleaning and enrichment swapping.

name: Kaytee CritterTrail Habitat
description: Expandable small pet habitat with connectable tunnel ports, deep bedding area for burrowing, integrated exercise wheel, and ventilated top—encouraging natural digging and exploratory behaviors.

name: Prevue Pet Flight Cage 16
description: Roomy horizontal flight cage designed for finches, parakeets, or canaries with multiple perches, dual feeder cups, and large front doors to facilitate enrichment rotation and social interaction.

name: Aqueon 10-Gallon Starter Kit
description: Complete 10-gallon starter aquarium kit including quiet power filter, preset heater, LED hood, and basic setup accessories—ideal for beginners establishing a stable tropical community tank.

name: Marineland Portrait LED Aquarium Kit (5-gal)
description: Portrait-style 5-gallon aquarium featuring curved glass profile, hidden filtration chamber, and day/night LED light modes to showcase aquascapes while maintaining discreet equipment integration.

name: Fluval Edge Aquarium (Marine LED, 6-gal)
description: Modern sealed-top nano aquarium with integrated filtration and 3D visual depth effect—suitable for minimalist freshwater scapes or carefully planned nano reef (with proper supplemental equipment).

name: Tetra Whisper Starter Kit (5-gal)
description: Value-focused 5-gallon kit bundling whisper-quiet filter, energy-efficient LED hood, and setup guide—supporting first-time fish keepers in establishing healthy cycling practices.

name: Dr. Elsey’s Kitten Attract Litter
description: Premium clay clumping litter infused with natural herbal attractants encouraging proper litter box habits in training kittens. Forms tight low-dust clumps for simplified daily maintenance.

name: World’s Best Cat Litter – Multiple Cat Formula
description: Natural compressed corn litter delivering rapid clump formation, strong ammonia odor control, and lightweight handling—optimized for multi-cat households seeking reduced tracking and dust.

name: Kaytee Aspen Bedding
description: Kiln-dried shredded aspen bedding free from aromatic oils, offering absorbent low-dust habitat substrate suitable for small mammals with sensitive respiratory systems.

name: Sand-King Clumping Cat Litter
description: Low-dust mineral clumping litter engineered for firm scoopable clumps and effective odor encapsulation, supporting a cleaner box environment for adult cats.

name: Armarkat Cat Tree Model A5201
description: Multi-tiered cat activity tree featuring sisal-wrapped posts, varied perch heights, and a cozy hideaway to encourage climbing, scratching, and vertical territory satisfaction.

name: SmartCat Ultimate Scratching Post
description: Extra-tall sisal rope scratching post with weighted base providing stable vertical stretch surface that helps condition claws and deter furniture scratching.

name: K&H EZ Mount Bird Perch Heater
description: Window-mount heated bird perch supplying gentle radiant warmth to support comfort and circulation during cooler months; tool-free suction design allows seasonal repositioning.

name: Petlinks Kitty Hottie Scratch Lounge
description: Corrugated cardboard lounge and scratcher combo with ergonomic curve encouraging full-body stretch while providing a resting cradle—includes catnip to entice initial interaction.

name: Kaytee Fiesta Bird Toy Set
description: Assortment of colorful chew and shred toys promoting mental stimulation, beak conditioning, and natural foraging behaviors in small to medium companion birds.

name: Zupreem FruitBlend Parrot Food
description: Balanced extruded parrot diet with distinct fruit shapes and natural flavors delivering consistent nutrition, controlled calcium, and fortified vitamins for medium to large hookbills.

name: Prevue Bird Swing with Mirror
description: Lightweight acrylic swing featuring integrated mirror to encourage activity, preening behavior, and enrichment through visual and vestibular stimulation in small cage birds.

name: Living World Exotic Blend Canary Food
description: Nutritionally varied canary blend combining cleaned seeds, fortified pellets, and dried fruits to provide balanced energy, natural foraging interest, and feather support.

name: API Tropical Fish Flakes
description: Highly digestible multi-flake formula enriched with vitamins C & E and color-enhancing carotenoids to support immune health, vibrant coloration, and clean water performance in tropical community fish.

name: Fluval C4 Power Filter Media Packs
description: Five-stage compatible media pack offering mechanical, chemical, and biological filtration components to maintain water clarity and nitrogen cycle stability in Fluval C4 power filters.

name: CaribSea Eco-Complete Aquarium Substrate
description: Biologically active planted aquarium substrate containing porous volcanic grains pre-charged with beneficial bacteria to accelerate cycling and root development.

name: Marineland Chromatic LED Clip-On Light
description: Low-profile clip-on LED fixture delivering balanced daylight and accent spectrum to enhance fish coloration and plant growth in nano to mid-size tanks.

name: Zoo Med ReptiSun 10.0 UVB Lamp
description: High-output 10.0 UVB fluorescent lamp providing essential ultraviolet radiation for calcium metabolism, bone density, and shell integrity in desert-dwelling reptiles.

name: Zilla Reptile Habitat Heater
description: UL-certified adhesive under-tank heater supplying consistent gentle warmth to create a thermal gradient in reptile enclosures without disturbing ambient humidity levels.

name: Exo Terra Desert Sand Substrate
description: Natural mineral sand substrate washed and sieved for particle consistency, creating an arid aesthetic while supporting healthy burrowing and thermoregulation behaviors in desert species.

name: Fluker's Deluxe Reptile Terrarium
description: Premium glass terrarium featuring front-sliding access doors, corrosion-resistant screen top for ventilation and UVB penetration, and cable pass-through ports for heating and misting equipment integration.

name: Kaytee CritterTrail 2-Level Habitat
description: Two-level modular habitat with expansion ports, exercise wheel, elevated feeding deck, and deep base promoting natural burrowing enrichment for hamsters and gerbils.

name: Oxbow Essentials Adult Guinea Pig Food
description: Stabilized vitamin C fortified timothy-based pellets supporting digestive efficiency, dental wear, and immune resilience in adult guinea pigs.

name: Living World Meadow Hay Rack & Basket
description: Elevated metal hay rack and basket combo reducing bedding contamination while encouraging natural grazing posture for rabbits and other small herbivores.

name: MidWest Homes for Pets Critter Cage
description: Large footprint small animal cage featuring deep scatter-resistant base, chew-resistant wire top, and dual access doors simplifying daily cleaning and enrichment rotation.
